title: Galaxy Z Flip 4 tipped to deliver a slightly bigger battery to Samsung’s most popular foldable
content:
The Galaxy Z Flip 3 turned out to be a huge success for Samsung’s foldable lineup when it debuted last year, but it came with the sour note of poor battery life. With the Galaxy Z Flip 4, it seems Samsung will address those battery woes with a slightly bigger cell.

more…

The post Galaxy Z Flip 4 tipped to deliver a slightly bigger battery to Samsung’s most popular foldable appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, the Galaxy Z Flip 4 will ship with a battery that's slightly bigger than what's in the Flip 3.
